page.title: 06JALAL KHAN'S WEEKDAY
page.content: I get up at 5.30 and go to the bathroom to brush my teeth and wash my face then I wash my hands and feet.Until it is 6.00 I say my prayers then I fetch my Koran from Its special shelf and read until 7.00.Afterwards I do my Bengali homework for about 15 minutes.Then I put on my school clothes and have break fast of cornflakes and orange juice.I o to school at 8.45. School starts at 9.00.If there is assembly I stay out of he Hall with the other Muslim boys until the notices are given.We have lessons from 9.20 till 10.30 a break of 15 minutes then lessons till 11.55 I have lunch in the school canteen of fish and chips,biscuits and coke.School starts again at 1.05 till 3.45.When I get home I wash my hands,feet and face change my clothes to say my prayers at 5.00.After I play with my Bengali mates .At 9.00 we have curry & rice,then bed.
